short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome extension facilitates on-the-fly translation from English to Devanagari within input fields on web pages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This project is a Chrome extension designed to enhance the user's browsing experience by providing real-time text transliteration(A form of text transformation from one writing system to another that entails the systematic substitution of letters) within input fields (such as textboxes and text areas) on web pages.
Steps:
1.Click on the extension icon in the toolbar.
2.A dropdown menu or a pop-up window will appear.
3.Click the "ON" button to turn on translation for web pages.
4. go to any pages, for example google.com and type in english alphabets to transliterate to hindi
